lead_paragraph: Peru's Nicolas Lionel Wettstein says he was inspired to chase his Olympic equestrian dreams when he watched French rider Pierre Durand win a gold medal in the individual jumping event at the 1998 Seoul Games.

headline.print_headline: Peru's Wettstein Spurred On by Memory of Durand
headline.main: Peru's Wettstein Spurred On by Memory of Durand

snippet: Peru's Nicolas Lionel Wettstein says he was inspired to chase his Olympic equestrian dreams when he watched French rider Pierre Durand win a gold medal in the individual jumping event at the 1998 Seoul Games....
